about_the_game:
Welcome to Capybara! Join the adorable and laid-back capybara on a delightful journey filled with endless clicking fun and strategic upgrades. Immerse yourself in the charming world of capybaras, where relaxation meets excitement, and every click brings you closer to becoming the ultimate capybara caretaker!


Gameplay:
In Capybara Clicker, your goal is to gather as many capybaras as possible by simply clicking on the screen. Each click earns you a cute and cuddly capybara. But the fun doesn't stop there! Unlock a variety of upgrades and enhancements to boost your capybara collection rate and automate your progress. The more capybaras you have, the faster you can gather even more!

Features:
  • Charming Capybara Mascot: Meet your friendly capybara guide who will accompany you throughout your clicking adventure, offering score
  • Endless Clicking Fun: Tap on your companion to gather scrore and watch your collection grow exponentially.
  • Exciting Upgrades: Invest your score in a wide range of upgrades. Increase your click power, automate capybara gathering, and unlock special abilities that make collecting capybaras even more efficient.
  • Idle Mechanics: Let the game work for you! Even when you're not actively clicking, your score will continue to multiply and gather themselves, thanks to your strategic upgrades.
  • Achievements and Milestones: Unlock achievements and reach milestones.

Embark on a relaxing yet thrilling journey in Capybara! Whether you're an active clicker or prefer a laid-back approach, this game offers endless fun and adorable capybaras at every turn. How many score can you make?

Download "Capybara" now and find out!
